title: When are we going to get the rest of the bots added to custom games?
body:
Or rather, the practice tool. 

A while ago Riot made more champion bots for the Coop vs. AI mode, but why is it such a problem to add those bots to custom games and the practice tool?

replies.body: They have to be programmed to execute combos and stuff , maybe you can volunteer
I think he is saying they already added the bots to co-op vs ai so they are already programmed. They just haven't added them to the list of pick-able champions in custom games.
Because theyre too lazy :( I have seen your exact question many times for a year or so.
